meanings.definition: Showing strong dislike or distrust of outsiders or those who are different.
meanings.sent1: The waspiest neighbor on the block always scowls at anyone new.
meanings.sent2: She gave the waspiest look to the unfamiliar visitor.
meanings.sent3: The waspiest cat hissed at the squirrel invading its territory.
meanings.sent4: His waspiest attitude stung like a swarm of angry bees.
meanings.sent5: The waspiest expression on his face made everyone feel unwelcome.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a wasp.
meanings.sent1: The black and yellow stripes on the costume made him look waspiest.
meanings.sent2: The waspiest insect buzzed around the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The waspiest toy drone zipped through the air with agility.
meanings.sent4: Her waspiest nature emerged when she felt threatened.
meanings.sent5: The waspiest features of the car were its sleek design and speed.

meanings.sent1: His waspiest mood was evident when he slammed the door.
meanings.sent2: She became waspiest when her plans were disrupted.
meanings.sent3: The waspiest driver honked angrily at the slow-moving vehicle.
meanings.sent4: The waspiest reaction came from him when his favorite show was interrupted.
meanings.sent5: The waspiest response was to snap at anyone who dared to speak to him.
